name: fetch_by_type
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool magical_taske.
Tool description: Fetch sceneries and getaways in Kenya.
API description: This endpoint fetches records by type as defined in `ABOUT` section above. You have to provide type and a limit of the number of records returned.

type.description: The type of records to fetch. Refer to the API documentation for accepted types.

limit.description: The number of records to fetch.
